thread.title: Ground News - Jack Grealish's mansion burgled while Man City star played against Everton
thread.title_full: Ground News - Jack Grealish's mansion burgled while Man City star played against Everton

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Jack Grealish's mansion burgled while Man City star played against Everton
text:
Summary by Ground News Jack Grealish 's family heard noises upstairs and dogs barking frantically. Police raced to the scene while a helicopter scoured the estate. The robbers managed to flee with £1million worth of watches and jewellery. No arrests have been made at this time and enquiries are ongoing. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Daily Mirror Lean Left Mixed Factuality Media Conglomerate: Reach Plc Jack Grealish's mansion burgled while Man City star played against Everton Jack Grealish's mansion was burgled as the Man City star played against Everton on Wednesday night, with police racing to his home and a helicopter was called in to search for the burglars

The incident happened while he was playing during City’s 3-1 win at Everton on December 27. Grealish rushed off to his Cheshire home after being informed of the incident after full-timeGetty Around ten relatives were watching the televised match when they heard noises upstairs and dogs barking frantically, The Sun rep…
